name: Mystic Empathy
description: The ability to deeply understand and connect with others' emotions and spiritual states beyond conventional empathy.

name: Critical Insight
description: A talent for profound analysis and intuition, enabling one to see the deeper truths and solutions in complex situations.

name: Lyrical Wordsmith
description: A talent for profound expression and poetic articulation, capturing deep emotional and intellectual truths.

name: Eclipsed Soul
description: A state where one's true essence is overshadowed by external influences or internal struggles, seeking light.
